headline: GE Vernova Sets New GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS™ title for the Largest Online Toy Drive in 24 Hours, Inspiring the Next Generation of STEM Leaders
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., December 08, 2025--GE Vernova today announced it has set a new GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS title for the largest online toy drive in 24 hours, marking a milestone in its global giving campaign focused on inspiring curiosity in future innovators through STEM-focused play.

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Hasbro and Mattel
summary: HAS and MAT stand out as smart-toy demand, licensing strength and innovation help offset cost pressures across a challenged industry.
